snippet: HARDY--Paige Ethington. The Women's Committee and the Trustees of the Central Park Conservancy mourn the loss of Paige Hardy, a member of the Women's Committee Board since 2014. Paige served as Co-Chairman of Playground Partners and as a Fall Luncheon Co-Chairman. She loved Central Park and was a devoted friend to the Conservancy. Her warmth, enthusiasm, and huge smile will be missed. We extend our deepest sympathy to Tripp and their children. Suzie Aijala, President, Women's Committee, Central Park Conservancy; Thomas L. Kempner, Jr., Chairman, Board of Trustees, Central Park Conservancy; Douglas Blonsky, President & CEO, Central Park Conservancy & Central Park Administrator 1/3
lead_paragraph: HARDY--Paige Ethington. The Women's Committee and the Trustees of the Central Park Conservancy mourn the loss of Paige Hardy, a member of the Women's Committee Board since 2014. Paige served as Co-Chairman of Playground Partners and as a Fall Luncheon Co-Chairman. She loved Central Park and was a devoted friend to the Conservancy. Her warmth, enthusiasm, and huge smile will be missed. We extend our deepest sympathy to Tripp and their children. Suzie Aijala, President, Women's Committee, Central Park Conservancy; Thomas L. Kempner, Jr., Chairman, Board of Trustees, Central Park Conservancy; Douglas Blonsky, President & CEO, Central Park Conservancy & Central Park Administrator 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HARDY, PAIGE ETHINGTON
